Get_what: Get what you love, choose how you pay.
You_are_now_at: You are now at check out with your selected e-bikes
Fill_in_your: Fill in your contact info and shipping address, click Continue to Shipping.
Confirm_your_contact: Confirm your contact and Deliver info, click Continue to Payment
Now_you_can: Now you can find Klarna as a payment option in the payment section as the image below
Select_Klarna: Select Klarna and confirm your billing address, click Pay Now
Now_you_will_be: Now you will be redirected to Klarna payment portal, choose monthly installments as the option that works best for you
Enjoy_your_shopping: Enjoy your shopping and let automatic payments do the rest
the_APR: the 0% APR financing is a special subsidy provided by Urtopia, there will be a 13% cancelling fee if an order made with this financing support is cancelled, other payments method made through Klarna shall shall stay unaffected.
